participant_1.background:
I am five feet tall.
I work in the healthcare industry.
I love film.
I have a dog named pedro.

participant_2.background:
I collect weird stickers.
I read a lot of poetry.
I will try any kind of food once.
I want to learn how to draw.
I like hiking in nature.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to hike in nature, read poetry, and collect weird stickers.
Wow, that's interesting. I've never been hiking before, but I've always wanted to try. I love reading poetry too. Do you have a favorite poet?
My favorite poet is Emily Dickinson. I love her use of language and her ability to capture the human condition in her poems.
I've heard of her, but I've never read any of her poems. I'll have to check them out. What kind of stickers do you collect?
I collect all kinds of stickers, but I'm especially fond of ones that are funny or quirky. I have a whole wall in my apartment covered in stickers.
That sounds cool. I love collecting things too. I have a whole collection of vintage film posters.
That's awesome! I love film posters. I have a few myself, but I don't have a whole collection.
We should go hiking together sometime. I'm sure we'd have a lot of fun.
That sounds like a great idea. I'd love to go hiking with you.
Great! We can start planning a trip soon.
